title: Contemporary Rose Gold Mangalsutra: A Modern Twist on Tradition
materials: 18K Rose Gold. Adorned with meticulously set Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features traditional black beads (potu).
features: This two-layered Mangalsutra offers a contemporary take on the traditional Telugu 'Pustelu'. The delicate rose gold chain is interspersed with striking black beads, symbolizing marital strength and protection. The pendants showcase a modern floral halo design, set with brilliant Cubic Zirconia for a touch of sparkle. Designed with lightweight comfort in mind, perfect for everyday wear.
occasions: Festive Celebrations like Sankranti and Diwali
description: A blend of tradition and modern aesthetics, this Mangalsutra is perfect for the contemporary South Indian woman. The rose gold and CZ setting offers a subtle shimmer and a touch of modern luxury, while the traditional black beads retain the piece's cultural significance. Itâ€™s lightweight, durable, and comfortable for daily wear, making it a lasting symbol of your commitment.
